## ScalarOperations.fromNumber() method

Returns an instance of the scalar type which most accurately corresponds to the value of `num`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract fromNumber(num: number): S;
```

|  num | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
